Subsection.title: Definition
Subsection.Paragraph: The metadata section specifies arbitrary metadata.

Subsection.title: Cardinality/Ordering
Subsection.Paragraph: A metadata section can appear [0, n] times in an SMF/B file, for any n.
The metadata section has no requirements on ordering.

Subsection.title: Magic Number
Subsection.Paragraph: The metadata section is identified by the magic number 0x534D465F4D455441.
